flavor: "We're called SP//dr, and we protect the city."
name: SP//dr Suit
text: Sync Ratio — Resource: Exhaust an [[Interface]] upgrade you control → generate that upgrade's resources.

name: SP//dr Suit
text: Permanent. This card's printed text box cannot be treated as if it were blank. Return to Base — Forced Interrupt: When you flip to this side, flip SP//dr to Peni Parker. Detach Peni Parker from here, moving all counters on her and cards attached to her to this card.

name: Peni Parker
text: Psychogenetic Compatibility — Setup: Put SP//dr Suit into play, [[Inactive]] side faceup. Maintenance — Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust SP//dr Suit → draw 2 cards.

name: SP//dr
text: Permanent. This card's printed text box cannot be treated as if it were blank. Suit Up! — Forced Interrupt: When you flip to this side, flip SP//dr Suit to its [[Active]] side. Attach this card to SP//dr Suit, moving all counters on this cards or cards attached to this card to SP//dr Suit.

name: VEN#m
text: [star] VEN#m gets +1 THW and +1 ATK for each sym counter on her. Hero Response: After VEN#m enters play, place 1 sym counter on her for each resource generated by SP//dr Suit's "Sync Ratio" ability to pay for her.

name: All Systems Go!
text: Hero Action: Choose: - Ready each [[Interface]] upgrade you control. - Search your deck and discard pile for an [[Interface]] upgrade and add it to your hand. (Shuffle.)

flavor: "We'll protect this city, no matter what." —SP//dr
name: Rapid Deployment
text: Hero Action (thwart): Remove 3 threat from a scheme. If you paid for this card using a resource generated by SP//dr Suit's "Sync Ratio" ability, remove 3 threat from a scheme.

flavor: "May wanted SP//dr to be better, to be the best we could. That's why she developed these web-traps!"
name: Web-Trap
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 5 damage to an enemy. If you paid for this card using a resource generated by SP//dr Suit's "Sync Ratio" ability, stun that enemy.

name: Aunt May & Uncle Ben
text: Action: Exhaust Aunt May & Uncle Ben and discard the top 2 cards of your deck (top 3 cards instead if you are in alter-ego form) → add each SP//dr card discarded this way to your hand.

name: Ejection Protocol
text: Hero Action: Discard Ejection Protocol → exhaust each [[Interface]] upgrade you control, set your hit point dial to 6, give your identity a tough status card, and flip to alter-ego form.

flavor: "Peni, listen to our orders very carefully."
name: SP//dr Command
text: Hero Action: Exhaust SP//dr Command and an [[Interface]] upgrade → draw 1 card. Hero Action: Exhaust SP//dr Command, choose and discard 1 card from your hand → ready an [[Interface]] upgrade.

flavor: "He trusts you… so will I." —Peni Parker
name: Host Spider
text: Hero Action: Exhaust Host Spider → ready SP//dr Suit.

flavor: "Can we listen to music? It helps us focus." —Peni Parker
name: Psychic Link
text: Hero Interrupt: When SP//dr Suit makes a basic thwart, exhaust Psychic Link → it gets +2 THW for that thwart.

flavor: "I thought you said it was a suit—this is speed-metal!" —Spider-Ham
name: Speed-Metal Alloy
text: Hero Interrupt: When SP//dr Suit defends against an attack, exhaust Speed-Metal Alloy → it gets +2 DEF for that defense.

flavor: "Progress takes patience. That's why we have to keep working on it." —Aunt May
name: Web-Fluid Compressor
text: Hero Interrupt: When SP/dr Suit makes a basic attack, exhaust Web-Fluid Compressor → it gets +2 ATK for that attack.

flavor: "Quiet breaks, shatters down, so the city reaches out. Listening… Waiting… Another station for a signal, and we're all some kind of noise. Be the good kind, Peni."
name: Daredevil
text: Response: After Daredevil defends against an attack, move 1 damage from him to the attacking enemy.

name: Spider-Man Noir
text: X is equal to the number of facedown cards attached to Spider-Man Noir. Response: After you resolve a treachery, if you control another [[Web-Warrior]] card, attach that treachery facedown here (to a maximum of 3).

name: Repurpose
text: Hero Action: Discard a [[Tech]] upgrade you control → ready your hero and choose THW, ATK, or DEF. Until the end of the round, your hero gets +X to the chosen power, where X is equal to that upgrade's printed cost.

flavor: "You now have the entire afternoon to reconsider your life choices. You're welcome." —Spider-Man
name: Thwip! Thwip!
text: Hero Action: Deal 1 damage to a [[Web-Warrior]] character you control → place a total of 2 stun status cards on up to 2 enemies.

name: Forcefield Generator
text: Uses (6 energy counters). Max 1 per player. Forced Interrupt: When you would take any amount of damage, remove that many energy counters from here. For each energy counter removed this way, prevent 1 of that damage.

name: Spider-Tingle
text: Interrupt: When you would reveal an encounter card, deal 1 damage to a [[Web-Warrior]] character you control → if that card is a treachery, cancel its "When Revealed" effects and discard Spider-Tingle.

name: Spider-Ham
text: Play only if you control a [[Web-Warrior]] card. [star]Forced Response: After Spider-Ham attacks of thwarts, discard the top card of the encounter deck. For each boost icon ([boost]) discarded this way, deal 1 damage to Spider-Ham.

name: Spider-Man
text: Play only if you control a [[Web-Warrior]] card. Response: After you play Spider-Man from your hand, ready an upgrade you control. If that upgrade has the [[Tech]] trait, draw 1 card.

flavor: "What, you think this fight is almost over?! That was just warm-up practice." —Thor
name: Limitless Stamina
text: Play only if your identity has at least 14 printed hit points. Hero Action: Ready your hero.

name: Unshakable
text:
Play only if your identity has at least 14 printed hit points.
Your identity gains steady.

name: Clarity of Purpose
text: Attach to a friendly character. Max 1 per character. Hero Resource: Exhaust this card and deal 1 damage to attached character → generate a [wild] resource.
